00000000          N:
00000000 00000a   data 10
00000001          sum:
00000001 000000   data 0
00000002 0000280a adj 40
00000003          start:
00000003 00000000 ldc 0
00000004 00000000 ldc N
00000005 00000004 ldnl 0
00000006 00000003 stl 0
00000007          loop:
00000007 00000002 ldl 0
00000008 0000070f brz end
00000009 00000102 ldl 1
0000000a 00000006 add
0000000b 00000103 stl 1
0000000c ffffff01 adc -1
0000000d 00000003 stl 0
0000000e fffff911 br loop
0000000f          end:
0000000f 00000102 ldl 1
00000010 00000100 ldc sum
00000011 00000005 stnl 0
00000012 00000012 HALT
